name: Dynamax Cannon
description: You unleash a strong beam of pure energy. Make a ranged attack on a creature, dealing 4d4 + MOVE dragon damage on a hit. If the target was dynamaxed, double the overall damage.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d12 at level 5, 4d8 at level 10, and 8d6 at level 17.
